summary: A young teenage Khajiit, has found himself locked up in prison, it is up to you to pick the lock... the very difficulty... lock... yeah...
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=6]J'aredoh the 'Friendly' Khajiit

[/size][size=4]Short Description
[/size][/u]J'aredoh is a teenage Khajiit, that has found himself locked up in the Dragonsreach dungeons. It is your job to save him. or don't... it's your life do what
[u][size=5][size=4]Long-ish Description
[/size][/size][/u][size=2]Basically, J'aredoh is crazy, but doesn't know it himself, although can seam menacing, only wants the best for everyone, but being a sneaky Khajiit in nature, found himself in a spot of trouble, can you cure J'aredoh of his mild, slightly, but not really inconvenient mind demons. (just a note, not gotten round to any quests yet, this is my first mod, ever, go easy on me :P)

[size=4][u]Compatability Issues[/u]
[size=2]So far for me I have not run into any[/size], [size=2]however with the vast expanse of mods available, I'm sure there will be one out there that pisses with J'aredoh, and I'm sure companion overhauls aren't gunna' be easy on him either[/size].

[u]Things Needed
[/u][size=2]skyrim[/size] [size=2]- newest version, although lets be honest, you probably have that anyway[/size]
[/size][/size][u][size=4]Development status
[/size][/u][size=4][size=2]Every now and then I'll hop back and forth tweaking a few things, so expect small updates usually, unless I add a quest or something, but lets be honest, likely won't be to massive.
[/size][/size][u][size=4]My Regards on Donations[/size][/u][size=4][size=2]
[url=https://www.g2a.com/r/overwatch-origins-edition-cheapg2a]Here[/url] - Buy Overwatch for hell of a lot less(and yes I know this is shameless promotion)   ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
[u]
[size=4]My last words
[/size][/u]idk, have fun, but expect bugs[/size][/size]
author: AlphaSpuCrab
